issue.title: [Rust]: Enable CI for AVX-512
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10613](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10613). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Enable CI for AVX-512, CI will work on the nightly compiler dating with a version later than 14.11.2020 as of today.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10613?focusedCommentId=17332160) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
